document.full_text: u.n. secretary-general ban ki-moon on monday hailed osama bin laden's death as a key turning point in the world's struggle against terrorism.
document.title: u.n. chief ban hails bin laden death as "watershed"
lines_and_colors: u.n. secretary-general ban ki-moon on monday hailed osama bin laden's death as a key turning point in the world's struggle against terrorism.
